data.prayer: Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the county of Bemetara.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Bemetara, Chhattisgarh, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, show your mercy on the 28,285 people in Bemetara who are far from you. Please add 5 new house churches this year.
Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 28,600 people living in Bemetara.
God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 315 believers in Bemetara, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Endra people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Endra people.
Father, help the stressed and anxious in Bemetara, Chhattisgarh, India know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the church in the county of Bemetara to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Bemetara you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

location.name: Bemetara
location.people_groups_list: Lohar (Hindu traditions), Sauntia, Nagarchi (Hindu traditions), Brahmin Telugu, Beldar (Muslim traditions)
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Lohar (Hindu traditions) (9,443,000), Sauntia (82,000), Nagarchi (Hindu traditions) (149,000), Brahmin Telugu (1,046,000), Beldar (Muslim traditions) (11,000)
